viz_unavailable: Structural analysis is not available for this pattern.
hint_multiple: You can add multiple test cases with newlines. Matches are highlighted in real-time.
viz_placeholder: Structure will appear here once a valid regex is entered.
welcome_desc: Visually analyze and verify AI-generated regular expressions.
feature_1: Tree visualization of regex structure for easy debugging.
feature_2: Real-time highlighting of matches on test strings.
feature_3: Zero data storage: All patterns stay in your browser.
meta_description: Visualize regex structure and verify AI-generated patterns against test strings securely.
meta_keywords: regex visualizer, regex tester, regular expression, verify ai regex, regex debug
meta_og_description: Don't trust AI, verify here. Visualize and clean your Regular Expressions.
